name: Paul David MIHALAKI, Appellant, v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, DEPARTMENT OF TRANSPORTATION, Appellee
name_abbreviation: Mihalaki v. Commonwealth, Department of Transportation
docket_number: Appeal No. 83 Western District Appeal Docket 1989

judges: Before NIX, C.J., and LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT, ZAPPALA, PAPADAKOS and CAPPY, JJ.
parties: Paul David MIHALAKI, Appellant, v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, DEPARTMENT OF TRANSPORTATION, Appellee.

opinions.text:
ORDEjR
PER CURIAM.
The opinion and order of the Commonwealth Court are reversed and the order of the Court of Common Pleas of Cambria County is reinstated. See Commonwealth of Pennsylvania, Department of Transportation, Bureau of Traffic Safety v. O’Connell, 521 Pa. 242, 555 A.2d 873 (1989).
Argued Sept. 25,
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

attorneys: Kevin J. Rozich, Russell, Pappas & Rozich, Johnstown, for appellant.
Christopher J. Clements, Asst. Counsel, Dept, of Transp. and Harold H. Cramer, Asst. Chief Counsel, Harrisburg, for appellee. ;
casebody.head_matter:
580 A.2d 313
Paul David MIHALAKI, Appellant, v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, DEPARTMENT OF TRANSPORTATION, Appellee.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued Sept. 28, 1990.
Decided Oct. 3, 1990.
Kevin J. Rozich, Russell, Pappas & Rozich, Johnstown, for appellant.
Christopher J. Clements, Asst. Counsel, Dept, of Transp. and Harold H. Cramer, Asst. Chief Counsel, Harrisburg, for appellee. ;
Before NIX, C.J., and LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT, ZAPPALA, PAPADAKOS and CAPPY, JJ.
